title: Add splash page root context to example Jetty configuration
description:
Right now, when you "java -jar start.jar" Solr's example Jetty, going to http://localhost:8983/ serves this error:


Error 404 - Not Found.
No context on this server matched or handled this request.
Contexts known to this server are:

    /solr ....



We can do better by providing a nice Solr-centric splash page here.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: +1 from me, especially if it can detect what context URL Solr is running on and not hardcode to /solr.  There are sometimes people that want to put Solr on the root context.  If there would be any manual steps required for that, the documentation should explain how it's done.
